com.ephesoft.dcma.user.connectivity.impl

Class LdapConnectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.user.connectivity.impl.LdapConnectivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserConnectivity

    public class LdapConnectivity
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserConnectivity
    This class connect to the LDAP server and fetching the result from the LDAP directory server.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    UserConnectivity
